text:
Hi Team, I want your guidance for a module that I want to implement for my public app. Can I create a custom object in the portal whenever my app is installed in the portal. I would also like to utilize Card Extension for the custom object. I am unable to find any resources for it. Do anyone know how to do this or any other workaround that you might recommend?
Appreciate your support. Thanks.

Am I doing something wrong - is it possible to have a verified domain on a marketplace app if the website is hosted on HubSpot too? It seems that when i verify the domain by adding the TXT records, it removes the domain from the other portal.
